title: Obsidian Security - Alert Insights
description: This dashboard provides visibility into alert logs, showcasing risks and threats identified by Obsidian Security through machine learning, expert rules, and other detection mechanisms.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides visibility into alert logs, showcasing risks and threats identified by Obsidian Security through machine learning, expert rules, and other detection mechanisms.

For more information, see the [Obsidian Security](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/obsidian_security/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Actors Involved in Alerts Over Time
